form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AMERICAN CONSULATE GENERAL, 226 GARDEN ROAD, HONG KONG

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 Please complete this form in two copies AMERICAN CONSULATE GENERAL, 26 GARDEN ROAD, HONG KONG Staple Photograph Here BIOGRAPHIC DATA REPORT Please answer all questions. If the information needed to answer any question is not available in Hong Kong, you should obtain it from wherever necessary before presenting this form to the Consulate General. Use extra sheets, if needed, particularly in replying to questions about residences, education, employment, and relatives. All persons 16 years or older must complete this form. Do not leave any questions unanswered. If the answer to a question is "no" or "none", so state, ALL NAMES OF CHINESE PERSONS AND PLACES MUST BE GIVEN IN CHINESE AND ENGLISH. 1. Full Name TANG Man 6772 2529 Surname First Second 1a. In Chinese 953 1b. Other names such as school 1c. In Chinese names, maiden names, etc. none 1d. Any other names (If none, so state) 2. Hong Kong Identity Card No. B324018 2a. Date you first obtained a Hong Kong Identity Card Date of Issuance June 28,1962 1951/5 3. Local Residence Address 4. Home Telephone K-254946 A-2 4th fl. Hong Keung Bldg. Hong Keung St. Sunpokong, Kowloon 5. Mailing Address (if different from above) 6. Office Telephone same as above 7. Your Nationality Chinese 7a. Former Nationality (if any) 8. Birthdate: Western August 25,1915 Lunar 8a Age 58 9. Birthplace Sun Tung Village, Sun Tung Heung, Mou Ming, Kwangtung, China (In Chinese and English) Village/town Heung/County Province Country PERF 10. All places you have actually resided since birth, including those for short periods of time (one month or more): Address CONSULATE STATES OF AME From GENERAL To China, Kwangtung, Mou-ming, Sun Tung Heung, Sun Tung Village birth 1938 China, Kwangtung, Siu-kwan, 10 Ng Lane Tang 1938 1943 China, Kwangtung, Lok Cheong, Lau ,Fu Village 1943/4 1945/9 China, Kiangsai, Lung Nam, 1945/9 1945/11 China, Kwangtung, Canton Hung Tak 5th Hong, #14 2/F 1945/11 1946/11 B.C.C.
